input_text:
Job Title: Software Engineer

Location: Charleston, SC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Primary Duties & Responsibilities

Works with development team lead(s), development team in an agile environment with a dynamic group of software developersPerforms as a team player, dedicated to program support, capable of multitasking and working complex and diverse tasks with and meeting defined deadlinesPerforms as a self-starter who is accountable and requires minimal direction and supervision; a person who is open to new ideas Develops software and implements APIs in Python, JavaScript, Java; ability to troubleshoot and refactor existing code baseAids in architecture development of software/firmware systems for embedded System on Chip (SoC) hardware platformsPerforms development and deployment of containerized software solutionsDesigns communications between distributed software components providing software and systems integration of multiple, disparate systems to provide new functionalityDevelops and delivers software, conduct software code review, develop user documentation, design and execute unit/integration/system test cases, test artifacts, test documentationProvides software and systems integration of multiple, disparate systems to provide new functionalityUtilizes developed communication skills and the ability to express thoughts and ideas clearly and concisely, employing technical writing techniquesResearch and recommend implementation for system features as well as improvements for existing system functionalityInterprets requirements and responds to requested changes

Minimum Skills & Requirements

Must possess or capable of obtaining an active TS/SCI clearance.Minimum of five plus (5+) years of software development experience Experience in an agile development environmentHighly motivated and able to work both independently and in a teamEffective complex problem solving skillsEffective communication and analysis skillsFormal education or equivalent experience in a systems or software engineering disciplineKnowledge of professional software engineering practices throughout the full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations.Coding experience in one or more of the following:Java / JavaScript / Node.jsPythonC/C++VHDLExperience with source control applications such as Git Understanding of network fundamentals
Desired Skills & Requirements

Experience developing/integrating RESTful APIsExperience developing/integrating gRPC Web Services / Google Protocol Buffers Familiar with container concepts (Docker) and orchestration (Docker Compose / Kubernetes)Experience creating and deploying Linux servicesExperience in Software Defined Radio / Radio Frequency (RF) systems, platforms, or softwareExperience with CI/CD pipeline common tools (Jenkins, Artifactory, SonarQube, BitBucket or similar) and practices Experience with Department of Defense information technology programs

SRC IS A CONTRACTOR FOR THE U.S. GOVERNMENT, THIS POSITION WILL REQUIRE U.S. CITIZENSHIP AS WELL AS, A U.S. GOVERNMENT SECURITY CLEARANCE AT THE SECRET LEVEL WITH TOP SECRET / SCI ELIGIBILITY

About Us

Scientific Research Corporation is an advanced information technology and engineering company that provides innovative products and services to government and private industry, as well as independent institutions. At the core of our capabilities is a seasoned team of highly skilled engineers and scientists with multidisciplinary backgrounds. This team is challenged daily to provide cutting edge technology solutions to our clients.

Scientific Research Corporation offers a competitive salary, an extensive benefits package and a work environment that encourages excellence. For positions requiring a security clearance, selected applicants will be subject to a government security investigation and must meet eligibility requirements for access to classified information.

DIVERSITY & INCLUSION

We strongly believe in the abundance of differences among individuals. We value different points of view and appreciate diverse perspectives. We truly believe this is what makes our organization inclusive and more responsive to the needs of our diverse customers.

EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER

Scientific Research Corporation is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer that does not discriminate in employment.

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, or national origin, disability or protected veteran status.

Scientific Research Corporation endeavors to make www.scires.com accessible to any and all users. If you would like to contact us regarding the accessibility of our website or need assistance completing the application process, please contact srchr@scires.com for assistance. This contact information is for accommodation requests only and cannot be used to inquire about the status of applications.

[#CJ ]

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
